definitions.title: n.pr.fl. Kĕ bār,
definitions.body: a river (or perhaps a canal) of Babylonia, not at present identified, by wh. the exiles, among whom Ez. ministered, were settled; always in the phr. [[נְהַר כְּבָר]] Ez Eze 1:1, Eze 1:3, Eze 3:15, Eze 3:23, Eze 10:15, Eze 10:20, Eze 10:22, Eze 43:3 (cf. Sm: Ez Eze 1:1 Del:Par. 47 f., 184).
